scripts.about:start: When running this server for the first time, make sure to build the application first with the build script
scripts.build: webpack build --config ./config/webpack.config.cjs --config-name server --stats-error-details --env mode=%npm_config_mode% && webpack build --config ./config/webpack.config.cjs --config-name client --stats-error-details --env mode=%npm_config_mode%
scripts.about:build: Builds the server and then the client bundles. When running 'npm run build' use '--mode=<production or development>' to specify build mode. Defaults to development.
scripts.about:dev: Runs the server, but watches for changes in files and restarts when detected any.
